name: Sidepanel Organizer
description: Organize all of your windows and tabs from the side panel.

01newTab.description: NEW TAB - opens a new tab within the active group (replaces cmd/ctrl + T)

02groupTabs.description: GROUP TABS - creates a group from highlighted tabs (highlight a tab by holding cmd/ctrl and clicking the tab's label)

03undoGroup.description: UNDO GROUP - ungroups all tabs in active group

04closeGroup.description: CLOSE GROUP - closes the active group

05shutdown.description: CLOSE ALL GROUPS - closes all open groups

06openTabs.description: OPEN TAB IN WINDOW - open active tab in pop-up window

07saveTab.description: SAVE TAB - save tab to active group's bookmark folder

08stashTab.description: STASH TAB - closes active tab and saves it to the active group's bookmark folder
